title: Australian war memorial
creator_credit: John Gray, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: An overview of the Australian War Memorial in Canberra, the quiet cloisters within it and the pictures, exhibits, dioramas, paintings, models and objects of war which recall the battles fought by Australians. Features the paintings and models which depict the 1915 Anzac landings in Turkey.
